name: 電腦教材設計與發展
description: The course provides students with the concepts and principles of designing and developing the instructional materials for computer courses. Students will be provided with the opportunity to examine both theories and practices in issues of instructional materials design. During the semester, students will have the opportunity to develop familiarity with designing instructional materials for various topics of computer courses, with considering different properties of various computer science subjects, from the aspects of education and psychology.
